localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
blogPost.body: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
blogPost.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products ❤️
blogPost.author: Kai Oelfke

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook产品的隐私友好型替代品。通过尝试这些替代方案，完全替换FB或减少使用它。建议一个隐私友好的替代方案，帮助人们减少对一家公司的依赖。
localize.tagline: facebook产品的隐私友好替代方案❤️

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook產品的隱私友好型替代品。通過嘗試這些替代方案，完全替換FB或減少使用它。建議一個隱私友好的替代方案，幫助人們減少對一家公司的依賴。
localize.tagline: facebook產品的隱私友好替代方案❤️

previous.excerpt: Teams by CALA is now available. With Teams, users can collaborate on the clothing design and manufacturing processes within one platform, eliminating siloed conversations among the sometimes 20+ specialists that work to bring fashion collections to life.
previous.title: CALA - Teams - How fashion brands run their business.

localize.description: CALA的团队现已上市。有了Teams，用户可以在一个平台上对服装设计和制造流程进行协作，消除了有时超过20名专家之间的孤立对话，他们的工作是将时尚系列变为现实。
CALA的團隊現已上市。有了Teams，用戶可以在一個平臺上對服裝設計和製造流程進行協作，消除了有時超過20名專家之間的孤立對話，他們的工作是將時尚系列變爲現實。

next.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
next.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today

localize.description: 每天专注于三个最重要的任务。要想真正提高工作效率，你必须每天拿起最重要的三项任务。大幅度提高生产力，被很多专家认为是最好的待办事项策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 专注于今天最重要的3件事

localize.description: 每天專注於三個最重要的任務。要想真正提高工作效率，你必須每天拿起最重要的三項任務。大幅度提高生產力，被很多專家認爲是最好的待辦事項策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 專注於今天最重要的3件事
